name: Rim of Zitra
description:
We meet an unnamed soldier as he is being interviewed about his strange claims that he got to relive the day of the battle over and over again. As he describes the events of the day the player explores the paths the soldier has taken by swiping event cards left or right. The player has to manage his/her resources, learn about other soldiers and improve his skills even if it would be the end of him/her. Death is a natural part of the cycle so do not be discouraged.

Controls:
Mouse - dragging cards left/right + optionally playing the voice over on the cards via play button
